casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Timothy BLACKWELL. No. 490PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 6, 2005. Patricia A. Duffy, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State of NC. *529Marilyn G. Ozer, Chapel Hill, Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Timothy Earl Blackwell.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of September 2005 by Attorney General to Stay Issuance of Mandate:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of September 2005."
